org.freehep.postscript
Class DelegateGraphics2D

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Graphics
      java.awt.Graphics2D
          org.freehep.postscript.DelegateGraphics2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
DebugTransformGraphics2D
public abstract class DelegateGraphics2D
extends Graphics2D

Delegates all calls (except create) to hostGraphics. You can now overload one of them and do something special.

Author:
Mark Donszelmann
